title: If clear minimum marginal distance is proposed from one side as per these Regulation then other side marginal distance may be relaxed up to 50%
clause_text: If clear minimum marginal distance is proposed from one side as per these Regulation then other side marginal distance may be relaxed up to 50%.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
